Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1001.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As soon as you walk out of the infirmary, waves of commotion from beyond the side corridor door wash over you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1020.jpg', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Peering through the fire safety window, you see the summoned mercenaries standing in a semicircle, their gestures betraying fear and tension.'}
{3: 'Some clutch their weapons close to their chest, scanning their surroundings as if expecting some great threat to emerge at any moment.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary A', 3: 'Explain yourself! You have to tell us everything!', 4: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mona', 3: "Calm down. She's just a kid.", 4: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary A', 3: "This isn't about her being a child! We all saw that monster—what happens if it gets loose? How can we ensure our parents and loved ones stay safe?", 4: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Barley', 3: "You weren't exactly a saint when you were beating people up and stealing our stuff!", 4: '11'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary A', 3: "Yeah, we were desperate and hungry, so we stole some food. Once we're out, we'll accept any legal consequences—if we have to serve time, none of us will run from it! But those monsters are a completely different story!", 4: '11'}
{2: "...What's going on?", 3: '24'}
{3: 'Lucia gives a slight shake of her head, signaling you to wait and see how things unfold.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rose', 3: '...You asked about that device, so I told you the truth... Chaos gave it to me. She said we could use it to protect ourselves.', 4: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary B', 3: 'This "she" you\'re talking about—she could use that thing to protect us, or she could use it to trap us.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Mercenary B', 3: "Isn't that the exact same thing that's kept us trapped here for so many days? We didn't understand before because we'd never seen it, but now we get it.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's right to be wary of Hetero-Creatures, but we need to cooperate with her for now.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Why don't you go talk to them? They should be more familiar with you this time.", 3: '35'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1020.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia pushes open the door, her expression remaining stern.'}
{2: 'Smile, Lucia... just like before, stay calm and composed...', 3: '43'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Very Punchable Mercenary', 3: "Oh, look who's up—the wimp who had to be carried around yesterday.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia, give him a couple punches.', 3: '47', 4: '(Punch him)', 5: '51', 6: '(Stay calm, stay calm...)', 7: '61'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Surrendering Mercenary', 3: "Wait, wait! I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I already got a taste of her fists last night!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Surrendering Mercenary', 3: "Wait, wait! I'm sorry, I'm sorry! Let's talk this out! No need to get violent!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'It seems that Lucia\'s "persuasion" last night involved more than just words.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: "Perfect timing. You said you'd help everyone escape, and we believed you—that's why we gathered everyone here.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: "But what's the deal with this monster the kid mentioned? It can control those barriers? If it can come and go as it pleases and shut people out whenever it wants, what's stopping it from sealing this place off and doing whatever it wants once we're gone?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: "Don't tell me you two are working with it?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "No. We're about to address the matters related to her right now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: 'What?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "There's another hidden trouble in this city other than Chaos—she's the source of all those monsters patrolling the streets.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Remember the mechanical riot you mentioned last night? Those Hetero-Creatures share the same root cause... And the same problem exists beyond Constellia—you'll still encounter such machines once you leave.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: "So it's basically the end of the world out there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...You'll see the situation for yourself once you leave.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: 'How do you plan to deal with the problem here? By working with that monster?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The cooperation is temporary. Even Chaos fears that lurking threat—we'll deal with her, but only after we eliminate the greater danger.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "This will be dangerous, and you could get caught in the crossfire. That's why we want you to evacuate—there are people out there who need your help more.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If Commandant and I were scheming something, we could have killed you all right here.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia draws her Pyro Katana as flames ignite in her hair. Without her taking a single step forward, everyone backs away several meters.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "If you think I can't handle this alone, feel free to test that theory.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The people stand at a distance, exchanging bewildered glances before breaking into hushed whispers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: 'Let us discuss this among ourselves.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia sheaths her weapon and nods to the captain. The mercenaries retreat to where Chiko stands at the far end.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Yuko, who has been staying in the corner, now finds herself unexpectedly in the spotlight.'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Hello.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mustering every ounce of courage, she approaches.'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'That "hidden trouble" you mentioned earlier... Were you talking about Cradle?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Do you know what... she really is?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She voices the question that Cradle has always left unanswered.'}
{2: "...It's quite a long story.", 3: '115'}
{2: 'She\'s like a disaster-born "new human," but her nature is actually more complex.', 3: '116'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'I talked with her for a while. She told me she was a character created by an author.', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's not wrong, but it's more like she's using that character as a vessel, similar to...", 3: '119'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Possession?', 4: '1'}
{2: '...More like personality data conflict.', 3: '122'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: '...Sounds about the same.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Amidst the surrounding clamor, she takes a step back and leans wearily against the wall.'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "Well... at least the Cradle I spoke to was real, and didn't deceive me right from the beginning...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She takes a deep breath.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What did Cradle talk to you about?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Mostly far-fetched stories.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Would you mind telling me more? There might be some crucial intelligence in there.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Intelligence? Do the stories she saw in the Red Tide really count as intel?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Oh, and something about her creator and their will...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Anything else?', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "Apart from those... well, she said she came from the future, and something about her being... I didn't quite understand that part, some sort of administrator, I think.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "She had something to do in that future, but she failed before completing it. And she still couldn't figure out exactly why she failed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Oh, right... After you arrived, just last night, she came to me and said some weird things.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What did she say?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'She asked if I remembered how many times I had died, and if I had ever dreamed of becoming a butterfly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'I had no idea what she meant by that. Could she be talking about the tale of the "Butterfly Dream"?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1035.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Prefab/UiEffect/UiMovie/FxUiMovieHudieRole215.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Prefab/UiEffect/UiMovie/FxUiMovieHudieRole215.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: '...Maybe she meant something more literal...', 3: '160'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Prefab/UiEffect/UiMovie/FxUiMovieHudie215.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Prefab/UiEffect/UiMovie/FxUiMovieHudie215.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '4'}
{3: 'After you experienced death once in Constellia, there were times in your dreams when your vision followed the butterflies, as if you had become one of them.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1020.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Prefab/UiEffect/UiMovie/FxUiMovieHudie215.prefab', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Prefab/UiEffect/UiMovie/FxUiMovieHudie215.prefab', 4: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'So what is it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'She said she came here from the future, that she could travel through time... In some futures, she had actually killed you.', 3: '183'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'She killed me... but why?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Because she killed Chiko, and you sought revenge.', 3: '186'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Chiko?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "No way... She promised me that if I found my sister, she'd give me a chance to help her... How could she have killed her?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'And her response that time was...', 3: '190'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1035.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory101.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Coworker 1', 3: 'Who cares?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1020.jpg'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Is it also because of that personality data conflict you mentioned?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yes.', 3: '208', 4: "It's a bit different, but you could think of it that way.", 5: '208'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Is there any way to bring back her original self?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It might be possible, but I don't know how exactly.", 3: '210'}
{2: 'She has not completely forgotten you.', 3: '211'}
{2: 'She turned your consciousness into one of those butterflies around her and willingly swallowed it...', 3: '212'}
{2: 'Maybe you mean something special to her?', 3: '213'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: '...Special? Me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, she said she would give you a chance to hurt her.', 3: '216'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't understand either.", 3: '219'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "Do you know all of this because you're also from the future, just like her?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Seriously? She predicted your arrival, described your looks and names in detail, and claimed that you were the ones responsible for this disaster.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "...But after seeing all those people she killed, and hearing how she mocked me, I just can't trust her anymore...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "That's why I chose to trust you instead... Please don't lie to me, okay?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Well, that's indeed the case.", 3: '226'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: '...Just as I thought.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'So time travel really does exist...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "Please, tell me what's going to happen. Was she right? Will everyone really get caught in a calamity that never ends?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'What about me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "Cradle mentioned that in your future, you're familiar with my sister Chiko... Do you know me?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia casts a questioning look at you.'}
{2: "Didn't Cradle tell you anything about your own future?", 3: '234'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "She did. That's exactly why I wanted to hear it from you again.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Bianca once mentioned that Chiko had a younger sister in the Support Force, but she fell in battle during a mission.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'And then? How did I die? Did I cause trouble for Chiko?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Her sister was injured and corrupted before running into an Ascendant. When Chiko saw her sister still calling out for help, she couldn't bring herself to strike her down, and instead tried to save her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's a reasonable judgment of the situation.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Bianca', 3: "But she still turned a Corrupted... Under the Ascendant's control, she detonated the device at the bottom of the building, killing all fourteen Constructs who were conducting an investigation there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Chiko survived, but was gravely wounded in the process.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'She originally had the potential to use a specialized frame, but after that explosion, her M.I.N.D. was severely damaged, and she lost that qualification forever.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Even so... when she merged with the Hetero-Creature, she managed to retain a fragment of herself, preventing that massive body from going berserk.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bianca's hands paused briefly as she sorted through the mission reports."}

{2: 'Bianca', 3: "She never let go of her regret. Even though she knew her sister couldn't possibly survive after falling into the Ascendant's hands, she still couldn't bring herself to end it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '"To make someone give up before they\'ve fought till their last breath—that would be too cruel." I\'m sure that\'s what Commandant would say.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'But for most people, the ability to fight until the very end is a privilege reserved for "heroes" only... Though even as I say this...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "If I were faced with making that same choice about someone important to me, I'd probably hesitate for that crucial moment too.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1020.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Can you tell me?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You fell during a rescue mission of the Support Force, and before that, you had saved many lives. After you were gone... even the captain of the Support Force would still speak of you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "You haven't answered my question.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Did I... get many people killed by working with the wrong side... just like now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No one could have controlled their fate in that situation. It was an accident, not intentional harm.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "In the future, you'll meet many people whose lives you'll save. Don't blame yourself for something beyond your control.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Though Lucia speaks these words, her brow remains tightly furrowed.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/2-15Spine/UiMovieSpine/UiMovieLuxiya01idle/UiMovieLuxiya01idle.prefab'}

{3: 'Through countless cycles of death, she has witnessed the pain Yuko brought. Even understanding the circumstances and inner turmoil behind those actions, the wounds torn into her heart run too deep to simply absolve with a smile.'}
{3: 'In the face of inescapable desires and suffering, all words of reason and forgiveness shatter like fragile glass.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1020.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "So it's true. Cradle wasn't lying to me... Thank you for being willing to share it with me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Go talk to Chiko. Tragedy isn't inevitable.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "We've talked already. She told me she kept her distance because of the sensitive nature of her work, and she realized those mercenaries died because... I sought help from Cradle.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her gaze drifts to Chiko in the distance, their shared silence speaking volumes about the rift between them.'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'If you had a sister like me... would you forgive her?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia lowers her eyes as distant memories surge before her like relentless waves.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm not in any position to answer whether your real sister would forgive you or not.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Looking at Yuko, Lucia speaks these words as much to herself as to Yuko.'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If my sister were in your situation... I think, rather than answering on behalf of the victims whether to forgive her, I would want to tell her—the her from the beginning—something else entirely.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: '...Huh?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: '"...Your existence alone has meaning. You don\'t have to sacrifice something just to justify your right to live peacefully... That\'s not kindness—it only harms you in the end."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's wrong. And once you start down the wrong path, you'll keep falling deeper into the abyss trying to make up for that first mistake.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And once you step into that abyss, victimhood breeds hatred, and hatred leads to hurting others. Breaking free from this vicious cycle often demands an even greater sacrifice and time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yuko, if you could stand at the beginning of it all and look back at the choices you've made...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Is Chiko's forgiveness really what you're asking about?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Suddenly, a bitter, self-mocking laugh escapes Yuko's lips as she leans against the wall, slowly sliding down to the ground."}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "...I'm the one who can't forgive myself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "I made a mistake and couldn't forgive myself for that, and everything afterward... it was all just a cover-up. I was just desperately trying to justify my actions.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "You're right... The more I tried to do something about it, the more mistakes I made. Desperately trying to make myself needed... What did that accomplish in the end?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: '...I was too weak. I died there, dragged so many people down with me, and even hurt what little family I had left.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'If only I had time to grow... if only I had the power to change things...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unfortunately... there have never been any what-ifs.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She pulls the little Froggie from her chest and clutches it tightly in her hands, falling silent.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Do you like Froggie?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia bends down and crouches beside her.'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "Yeah... I loved Froggie's stories even before I graduated...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She murmurs with her head lowered.'}

{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "Froggie wasn't good at anything. It wanted to find a four-leaf clover of wonder so that it could have a home, but only ended up in one silly situation after another.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'But somehow... it still managed to find something meaningful in all those failures and mishaps...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Reading those stories made me wonder... if only I could find something meaningful in my own failures, just like Froggie.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Why bring this up all of a sudden?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I really like Froggie as well, but... I only recently found out that it has its own stories.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Huh? So before that... you just liked it for its design?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Sure does.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'You only recently found out its stories... Which book did you read?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The one where it started searching for a four-leaf clover to find happiness and a home.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Ah, the first book.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Does that story have an ending?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "Originally, there was one... In the end, Froggie still couldn't found a four-leaf clover, nor the home that was supposed to come with it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'But Froggie took the items gathered during his journey of failures to build a modest, rundown tent, and planted ordinary three-leaf clovers beside it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Even though they were just common clovers, Froggie tenderly nurtured and protected them, until one day... it found a four-leaf clover among them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "Froggie couldn't find a four-leaf clover of wonder, but it ended up creating one instead...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As Yuko speaks, she pulls out a Froggie-shaped voice recorder from her pocket.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'I have a song here written for Froggie, though I only kept the instrumental track and lyrics.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a sniff, she holds back her tears and hands over the voice recorder in a solemn gesture.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Lucia, I would like to give this to you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'Yes. You helped the people who were trapped here, and you shared a lot with me... Thank you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "This song never had the chance to be released. It's a miracle itself that someone who loves Froggie gets to hear it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'With this miracle, I wish for you and your most cherished one... to be able to create your own four-leaf clover of wonder.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: 'I should be the one thanking you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stands up with a wave goodbye and walks away.'}
{3: "Watching as Yuko's figure disappears into the distance, you softly call out to Lucia."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm here, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'The mercenaries are still in their discussion. Want to take a walk over the observation bridge?', 3: '379'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1014.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1014.jpg'}
{3: 'Stepping out of the infirmary, you walk onto the observation bridge basking in the morning sunlight.'}
{3: "The streets below appear clean and orderly, showing no trace of the Red Tide's corruption—it seems the long night has finally passed."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/2-15Spine/Luxiya2SHuoLogin/UiMovieLuxiya2SHuoLogin.prefab'}
{3: 'Lucia stretches slightly in the sunlight, then sits down on the edge of the observation bridge, turning back to look at you.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is there something you want to say?'}
{2: 'The look on your face when you were talking to Yuko... Were you missing your home?', 3: '392'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Yeah, a little bit.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is the Golden Age... when they should still be alive.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I know I can't change the past."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We have more important things to do, and our own home to return to. And these words... I only say them when you ask.'}
{3: 'Lucia squints her eyes in the breeze, her gaze drifting far into the distance.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, look.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "At the end of the leftmost street, there's an exit. It's the highest point around here, also quite far from the underground parking lot."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Once everyone's gathered, we'll have them evacuate from there. Even if Cradle deploys the Red Tide, it'll still take some time to reach that location."}
{3: 'With a smile, Lucia outlines the next steps of the plan.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'As we move out, we take the vanguard position, with the mercenaries covering the rear, keeping the employees protected in the middle.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, could you provide ranged support for those in the rear? Just... please stay within my sight.'}
{2: "No problem. It's indeed safer this way.", 3: '408'}
{3: 'Lucia nods, letting out a soft sigh against the cold wind.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...From here on, it's going to be one battle after another."}
{2: "Yeah, we can't let our guard down until we're home.", 3: '411'}
{2: 'Are you hiding something from me?', 3: '413'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Why do you say so?'}
{2: 'Hmm... just a feeling, I guess?', 3: '415'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's nothing... Just some uncertainties. There's no point discussing them now—we'll only know once we're inside the Inver-Hetero Tower."}
{3: 'In the end, she chooses to keep her thoughts to herself.'}
{3: 'And so, standing beside her, you also remain silent about the plans for when you enter the Inver-Hetero Tower.'}
{3: 'Winter sunlight breaks through thin clouds and the force fields enveloping Constellia, casting a radiant golden hue over the city.'}
{3: 'She reaches out as if to grasp something in the wind before her, then lets out a soft sigh at its intangible nature.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Time to go home, Commandant.'}
{3: "...It's time for you to go home."}
{2: "Mm... Let's go home together.", 3: '424'}
{3: 'Like countless times before, you reach out to Lucia, and she responds with a smile, taking your hand in hers.'}
